meanings.definition: Expressions of good wishes when parting or at the end of a conversation.
meanings.sent2: We exchanged goodbyes as we left the party.
meanings.sent3: Goodbyes, my friend! Until we meet again!
meanings.sent4: Her cheerful goodbyes brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt goodbyes brought tears to our eyes.

meanings.definition: The act of saying farewell or bidding adieu.
meanings.sent2: The goodbyes at the airport were emotional.
meanings.sent3: The cat's goodbyes to the mouse were final.
meanings.sent4: The goodbyes echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: His goodbyes lingered in the air long after he left.
